name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Kevin FRAZIER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Kevin FRAZIER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of April, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether the Superior Court erred in holding that Petitioner’s claims were waived because he did not file a statement of matters complained of on appeal as set forth in Pa.R.A.P 1925(b)?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1273
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Kevin FRAZIER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 8, 2002.
